name: @zedvision/jsframe
description: It is an independent lightweight multi-window library for javascript. - Create various popup windows. - Styling the appearance flexibly.

scripts.min: deno fmt lib && yarn esbuild --minify lib/jsframe.js --outfile=lib/jsframe.min.js && rm -rf public/jsframe.js && cp lib/jsframe.min.js public/jsframe.js
scripts.clean: deno fmt src && rm -rf lib && mkdir lib

author: Tom Misawa <riversun.org@gmail.com> (https://github.com/riversun)
